# attributesByName

**Instance Property**

The attributes of the receiver in a dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributesByName: [String : NSAttributeDescription] { get }
```

## Discussion

The keys in the dictionary are the attribute names and the values are instances of [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSAttributeDescription]. .

## Working with properties

- **propertiesByName**: A dictionary containing the properties of the receiver.
- **properties**: An array containing the properties of the receiver.
- **relationshipsByName**: The relationships of the receiver in a dictionary.
- **relationships(forDestination:)**: Returns an array containing the relationships of the receiver where the entity description of the relationship is a given entity.
